slides.title: Dune
slides.description: A science fiction film based on Frank Herbert's novel, exploring the desert planet Arrakis and its valuable resource, spice.

slides.title: Inception
slides.description: A mind-bending thriller directed by Christopher Nolan, where a thief enters the dreams of others to steal secrets.

slides.title: Interstellar
slides.description: A visually stunning space epic directed by Christopher Nolan, exploring themes of love, sacrifice, and the survival of humanity.

slides.title: Avengers: Infinity War
slides.description: A superhero film featuring the Avengers and their allies as they face the powerful Thanos in a battle to save the universe.

slides.title: The Conjuring
slides.description: A horror film based on the real-life paranormal investigations of Ed and Lorraine Warren, focusing on a haunted farmhouse.
